name: Redmine hipchat
tagline: Plugin for Redmine to deliver room notifications.
body:
### Redmine for Hipchat Server
Supports HipChat Server and HipChat API V2
This plugin sends messages to your HipChat room when issues are created or updated.

**Setup**

    cd REDMINE_ROOT
    git clone https://github.com/wreiske/redmine_hipchat plugins/redmine_hipchat 
    rake redmine:plugins:migrate RAILS_ENV=production

In Redmine, go to the Plugin page in the Adminstration area.
Select 'Configure' next to the HipChat plugin and enter the required details.

### Authors and Contributors
Original plugin was developed by @powdahound at Hipchat for hipchat.com, this plugin has been modified by @wreiske to support the new Hipchat API v2 and Hipchat Server.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Redmine Hipchat? Start a support request at https://github.com/wreiske/redmine_hipchat/issues
